snippet.title: Sword of Justice - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Sword of Justice - Official Trailer

Prepare yourselves for an extraordinary journey within the world of Sword of Justice, NetEase's flagship wuxia MMORPG.

Embark on an Expansive Wuxia World: Step into the enchanting landscapes of the Northern Song dynasty. Engage in the bustling life of jianghu, where every interaction, from the blooming flora to the varied inhabitants, shapes your unique experience. NPCs, powered by AI, react dynamically, ensuring your actions influence the game's plot and the world's order.

Explore, loot, and craft rare equipment and skills in a game that shatters traditional MMO limitations. "Learning by stealing" and "self-mastery" mechanics offer boundless opportunities for forging your distinct battling style.

Experience industry-leading graphics, art, and music. Witness the beauty of a panoramic weather system, advanced lighting, dynamic physics, and AI-driven NPCs, all steeped in the Eastern charm of jianghu.

Choose your preferred gameplay style, whether in dungeons, battles, or leisure activities. Each avenue guarantees substantial rewards, ensuring everyone unleashes their full potential.

About Sword of Justice:

Sword of Justice is an open-world martial arts MMORPG with a unique art style that combines traditional oriental aesthetics with modern graphics technology. The game's innovative AI system allows for a more immersive and interactive gaming experience, with a focus on exploration and player choice. The game's design concept challenges traditional MMORPG norms and offers a new take on the genre.
